titleStmt.title: Epigrammatum Ioannis Owen Cambro-Britanni libri tres Ad illustrissinam [sic] D. Mariam Neuille, Comitis Dorcestriæ filiam, patronam suam.
Epigrammata. Selections
titleStmt.author: Owen, John, 1560?-1622.

publicationStmt.publisher: Ex officinâ Humfredi Lownes, sumtibus Simonis Waterson,

notesStmt.note: "Epigrammatum Ioannis Owen, Cambro-Britanni, ad excellentissimam & doctissimam heroïnam, D. Arbellam Stuart, liber singularis. Editio prima" has separate dated title page and register.
Part 2 identified as STC 18985 on UMI microfilm reel 723.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library and the Bodleian Library.
Appears at reel 723 (British Library copy) and at reel 1491 (Bodleian Library copy).
